text: I have seen the new way to create CTA's. As a developer we styled the CTA's theme based by using the no style CTA, and than triggering it by HubSpot classes in css. What is a good way to style CTA's theme based in the new way? I cannot find any info about it in the documentation. Or is there a possibility to create CTA templates for example?
From what we have found, it isn't possible to style the new CTAs using the theme
<@UATE4ATHP> <@UAY2E7JSU> <@UBT0AHWLD> have you found a way to work with the new Embeddable CTAs via theme settings?
Nope, you can't. They load them inside an iframe :upside_down_face:
that's what we found too, just making sure we didn't miss something :disappointed:
I'd love to know why this is a better way forward...
Yeah its a BIG change force on everyone....
When I saw it, I just called it and took the day off :rolling_on_the_floor_laughing:
I haven´t worked with them yet.. but yeah, <@UATE4ATHP> is right that i can´t be done if it´s in an Iframe. Would be interesting to know the reason behind that decision
I understand wanting to make CTAs available for Starter, but there had to be a better way than implementing a breaking change for nearly every theme
Have you figured out a way to transition the theme to remove the legacy CTAs? I'm still taking a day off on this one :wink:
I think someone would just have to go in and edit every module where a CTA is loaded and load a new one.
I found out that if you start a fresh website, there is no option for legacy CTAs. So I think the existing websites with the legacy CTA's keeps the same. But the new ones will be the new version
that would make sense..
Design and development are stressing here, because we ALWAYS style CTAs :joy:

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/changelog/upcoming-sunset-legacy-ctas>

We are getting a way to clone a Legacy CTA into a new CTA
Thats nice. But if we create new themes we still have a lot limitations. I hope there will be a way, it is still in beta. So hoping it will be better
even copying a legacy CTA to a new CTA, it still doesn't help from the theme developer side, we would have to wait for every user to transition before the theme could be updated
Wait what has to be updated? The current CTA field will still work, just have to swap out the The Legacy CTA for a new one. Unless I'm missing something
maybe I'm missing something, but you can't select one of the new CTAs from the current settings, maybe it won't be possible until later when they can copy it over?
There should honestly be a way to use custom modules in those new CTA, if not we're just making a step backwards
Wait really? in all my custom modules I can choose between CTAs and CTAs (Legacy) <@U03AKL6Q1B2>
With existing websites where there are legacy CTAs used, it is possible to switch. Otherwise it's only the new way
I'll have to check again, thanks <@UATE4ATHP> that option wasn't there before, I'm not sure when it was added

<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Developer-Announcements/Upcoming-Sunset-Legacy-CTAs/m-p/826743#M479|this thread in the community> has good info regarding the sunset in case anyone else has questions
